SELECT mS.id AS subitemId, mS.subitem_name AS subitemName, mC.id AS categoryId, mC.cname AS categoryName, mS.semester AS semester, mR.id AS recordId, mR.description1 AS description1, -- If there's no record (mR.id IS NULL), mark done as false CASE WHEN mR.id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS done FROM _sw_mileage_subitem AS mS INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_category AS mC ON mS.category_id = mC.id LEFT JOIN _sw_mileage_record AS mR ON mR.subitem_id = mS.id WHERE (#{semester} = 'all' OR mS.semester = #{semester})
AND mS.subitem_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND mC.cname = #{category}
AND ( (#{done} = 'Y' AND mR.id IS NOT NULL) OR (#{done} = 'N' AND mR.id IS NULL) )
AND (mR.snum = #{studentId} OR mR.snum IS NULL)
AND mS.semester >= CONCAT('20', SUBSTRING(#{studentId}, 2, 3), '-01') AND mS.semester LIKE '20%' AND mS.semester REGEXP '^20\\d{2}-(01|02)$'
ORDER BY mS.regdate;
